179 Hectares of upland farms were converted into sustainable agro-forestry areas, increasing the City's forest cover.
Bago City in the Philippines is the “Rice Granary of Negros Occidental”. Our majestic biodiversity nurtured by a multitude of farming villages ensure the ...
Bago City is a city in Negros Occidental. It is known for its historical sites and natural treasures, and as the "rice granary of Negros Occidental".
